The Master Web package (`@mbc-cqrs-serve: The Master Web package (`@mbc-cqrs-serverless/master-web`) provides a complete set of React components for managing master data and settings. It integrates seamlessly with the backend Master Service and includes pre-built pages, forms, and data tables.
